description: After a heartwarming dessert that cooks in less than 2 minutes? Look no further than this deliciously festive fruit mince mug cake recipe.
keywords: Mug cake,Christmas,Bonus,Nov 2021,Leftovers,Fruit mince pie & tart,Quick & easy dessert
name: Fruit Mince Mug Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine eggs, fruit mince and milk together in a medium bowl.
Add flour and baking powder, then stir until until combined. Add butter and stir until combined.
Divide mixture evenly between 2 greased 1 1/2cup capacity microwave-safe mugs. Microwave on high for 1 minute and 30 seconds or until puffed and just firm when lightly touched.
Dust with icing sugar and serve drizzled with maple syrup.
